about_the_game:
A space theme of a small casual shooting game

There are two perspectives, the character and the ship
The world is full of monsters and enemies
The player can control the character/ship, dodge or shoot enemies, and replenish energy and various items consumed by collecting
Collect discarded parts and items to enhance character abilities
Bullets have 5 levels, but the energy cost also increases with the level of the bullet

The story:
Due to the failure of the mission, the abandoned spaceship wandering in the deserted universe crash-lands on the planet of Pai. The player will control and lead the protagonist to face the monster enemies in the game and find a way to escape from Pai, looking for the hope of survival.

name: Under The Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: A space theme of a small casual shooting game. There are two perspectives, the character and the ship. The player can control the character/ship, dodge or shoot enemies, and replenish energy and various items consumed by collecting. Collect discarded parts and items to enhance character abilities.
